title: Is China a shadow of its former self? - Quora

response.answer_text: China is progressing too fast and leading the world in many industries and fields that is why America is targeting China. China under the same course and speed would displace America in a couple of years. America is currently trying to suppress China via a few methods : Trade tariffsEntity listGlobal smear campaignPressuring Allies and countries to ban Chinese companiesPreventing Chinese companies from investing in USPreventing Chinese students from studying in USPreventing Chinese Nationals from working in key industriesAnd a lot of other things

May I know what Planet you are from, That is a very very strange question, When China is now possibly the leading manufacturing country in the world, and advancement in all aspects of science in the world.
